metadata.Title: EvapoTranspiration (EnergyBalance strategy, SiriusQuality2)
metadata.Authors: Peter D. Jamieson; Glen S. Francis; Derick R. Wilson; Robert J. Martin
metadata.Institution: New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd.
metadata.Extended description: This strategy computes daily evapotranspiration by selecting between two methods depending on data availability. If wind and vapour pressure are available (isWindVpDefined = 1), it uses the Penman approach; otherwise it uses the Priestley–Taylor method. Inputs are the pre-computed Priestley–Taylor ET (r.evapoTranspirationPriestlyTaylor) and Penman ET (r.evapoTranspirationPenman), and the output is the selected evapotranspiration (r.evapoTranspiration). The component is part of the SiriusQuality2 EnergyBalance module.
metadata.Short description: Chooses Penman or Priestley–Taylor evapotranspiration based on data availability.
